attributes.title: Is there one god? Brahma Sutra 2 short clips by Nithyananda
attributes.description:
In this short clip taken from Brahma Sutra 2, living avatar Paramahamsa Nithyananda describes about the concept of one god and many gods. He describes Hindu tradition and its many gods that people worship.

The full Brahma Sutra 2 discourse is available at www.nithyananda.org/brahma-sutra-discourses-nithyananda

You can watch Paramahamsa Nithyananda speak live on Brahma Sutra at www.nithyananda.org/en-tv
